column4: hey all i have a question...if someone could help that would be great
i split a 6gb file using the split command....now when i try to rejoin using the cat command I get an error at 4gb saying file too large
you tryint to join them on a fat32 parittion/filesystem?
i though fat32 had a limit on filesized
at least I think fat32 has a 4gb limit.
there ya go.. cant make a file larger then  4gb
